title: Crashing before load screen
body: So i went to start a typical ranked game and the league of legends title wasnt coming up so i got worried, then the client tells me the game crashed! so i think no worries ill just try to reconnect, it would not let me reconnect and i even restarted my computer so the 4 people that were on my team are going to report me im going to have a low priority queue now and theyre all (including me) goign to lose LP for some awkward reason that i dont know about, please help me and my team by giving them loss prevention, PLEASE im not afking on purpose or anything and i tried repairing the client but now i have to redownload 3gb for no reason! i dont have that kinda usage to just abuse i use my ipads hotspot .. im sorry, but please just help me ...

replies.body:
>please help me and my team by giving them loss prevention

Loss Prevented is not handed out on an individual basis. Additionally, you being away from that game does not guarantee that your team will lose. Would you still give loss prevented if your team had won?

Also I don't think they'd all report you. You weren't afk, you didn't connect, and people understand that others have technical issues at times.

Anyway, about the game, I'd say avoid playing for a while. There's some issues going on with the servers, and I have no idea what's being done about it. Wait for a few days, and then reply to this message.
